message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm still not convinced that $11,500 is a good price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $10,250? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
